title: AddSOAPRequestHeader
name: AddSOAPRequestHeader
description: Adds a SOAP header to a web service request before making the request.

arguments.name: webservice
arguments.description: A web service object as returned from the cfobject tag or the CreateObject function.

arguments.name: namespace
arguments.description: A String that is the namespace for the header.

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: A String that is the name of the header

arguments.name: value
arguments.description: the value for the SOAP header; this can be a CFML XML value.

arguments.name: mustUnderstand
arguments.description: Sets the SOAP mustunderstand value for this header.
